name: loom (itch)
description: Loom is a reflection of the remarkable human ability to make a home out of adverse environments. Its architectural style is inspired by the buildings of Le Corbusier and the larger Brutalist canon, a movement which was harshly criticized for its authoritativeness and inhumanity. Rather than taking an initial stance on this position, Loom invites the player to explore the emptied out shells of buildings, and assists them in imagining the potential for vibrant life within an assemblage of concrete geometry.
